1094710.1134/10947.1573-8779Journal of Structural ChemistryJ Struct Chem0022-47661573-8779Pleiades PublishingMoscowS002247661602024438210.1134/S0022476616020244Brief CommunicationsCrystal structure of the inclusion compound of a porous metal-organic polymer with cymantreneKhanI. S.12aSamsonenkoD. G.1PakomovaV. M.3FedinV. P.1grid.4886.20000000121929124Nikolaev Institute of Inorganic Chemistry, Siberian BranchRussian Academy of SciencesNovosibirskRussiagrid.4605.70000000121896553Novosibirsk National Research State UniversityNovosibirskRussiaKazan State Agricultural UniversityKazanRussiacluster@niic.nsc.ru255201632016572413416205201624920152552016© Pleiades Publishing, Ltd. 20162016Abstract

The inclusion compound of the composition [Zn2(dmf)(bdc)(lac)]∙[Mn(C5H5)(CO)3] (C5H5 = cyclopentadienyl) is obtained by keeping a mixture of crystals of a porous homochiral metalorganic polymer of the composition [Zn2(dmf)(bdc)(lac)]∙DMF (DMF = N,N′-dimethylformamide, H2bdc = terephthalic acid, H2lac = S-lactic acid) with the excess of cymantrene at 100°C, and the crystal structure of this compound is determined.

elements.content: The inclusion compound of the composition [Zn2(dmf)(bdc)(lac)]∙[Mn(C5H5)(CO)3] (C5H5 = cyclopentadienyl) is obtained by keeping a mixture of crystals of a porous homochiral metalorganic polymer of the composition [Zn2(dmf)(bdc)(lac)]∙DMF (DMF = N,N′-dimethylformamide, H2bdc = terephthalic acid, H2lac = S-lactic acid) with the excess of cymantrene at 100°C, and the crystal structure of this compound is determined.
elements.clean_text:
Abstract

The inclusion compound of the composition [Zn2(dmf)(bdc)(lac)]∙[Mn(C5H5)(CO)3] (C5H5 = cyclopentadienyl) is obtained by keeping a mixture of crystals of a porous homochiral metalorganic polymer of the composition [Zn2(dmf)(bdc)(lac)]∙DMF (DMF = N,N'-dimethylformamide, H2bdc = terephthalic acid, H2lac = S-lactic acid) with the excess of cymantrene at 100°C, and the crystal structure of this compound is determined.

metadata.title: Crystal structure of the inclusion compound of a porous metal-organic polymer with cymantrene
